description: The best soufflé shop in Dadaocheng offers delicious and attractive Taiwanese-flavored soufflés. The shop is located in a traditional Taiwanese two-story house with a shrine hall table in this café. Enjoying a fluffy soufflé in this incense-filled, classical space is a unique experience in this ancient city.
address: 1F, No. 25, Section 2, Yanping N Rd, Datong District, Taipei City, 10344

product1.description: Original soufflé pancake, Taiwan oolong tea whipping cream, peanuts.
product1.name: Fú Dàu Oolong Tea Soufflé Pancake

product2.description: Original soufflé pancake, mullet roe with rice wine, salted egg yolk, mix nuts with gold leaf.
product2.name: Mullet Roe with Salted Egg Yolk Soufflé Pancake
